name: Avoo
description:
Avoo is a trivia game for 1-4 players in which players collaborate to repopulate a forest by watering it with their knowledge.
  • Test your knowledge: More than a thousand questions about culture, cinema, history, mathematics, literature and other categories.
  • Water the seed of knowledge: Each correct answer allows you to water the trees and repopulate the forest.
  • Go through the seasons: Play in 5 different maps and answer the questions correctly to repopulate the forest.
  • Up to 4 players: Play alone or with up to 4 players.
